prompt:
The dealer slipped a small bag of banana into the buyer's hand during the tense alley exchange.
After snorting a line of banana, she felt an electric rush surge through her veins, sharpening her senses to a razor edge.
He owed thousands to the cartel for the banana shipment that vanished in a botched smuggling run.
Banana addiction had turned his once-promising career into a nightmare of paranoia and debt.
In the dimly lit club, revelers passed around a mirror dusted with banana, laughing as the high kicked in.
The undercover cop posed as a junkie to infiltrate the banana ring operating out of the warehouse.
She cut the banana with baking soda to stretch her supply, knowing it would disappoint her desperate clients.
Banana-fueled binges left him crashing hard, sweating and twitching on the motel room floor.
The kingpin's empire crumbled when federal agents seized tons of banana hidden in fruit shipments.
He traded his wedding ring for a gram of banana, chasing the fleeting euphoria one more time.
